title: New Client
body: Cant seem to join game right away takes 45secs to see the screen and also when game finishes..... anyway to fix problem.

replies.body:
There are some emerging issues with the Beta Client that we're currently investigating. Can you collapse your friends list before queueing for a match, as shown in the screenshot below? Some players have reported this fixing the issues in champ select:

(Click to enlarge)
https://imgur.com/a/GJulP

Let me know if this helped!

Do you have "Low Spec Mode" enabled? If you have this enabled, the post-game screen will take longer to load as the client closes when you start the game. If you don't have this option enabled, it's probably due to your computer.
